name: akamoney
description: URL Shortening Service with Vue 3 and Cloudflare Workers

scripts.dev: npm run dev:frontend & npm run dev:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:frontend && npm run test:coverage:backend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
